Text: MPAR Executive Briefing Materials Cc Team By now I trust you have had a chance to review the following briefing materials Olympus Quick Tour CDROM Navigation Exercise Section I of the Olympus simulation manual Harvard Business Review articles Introduction to Financial Ratios and Financial Statement Analysis Assessing a Companys Future Financial Health What is Strategy Customer Intimacy and Other Value Disciplines During our presession meeting next week we will be exploring in greater detail the Olympus simulation environment As you are aware from the agenda we will be immersed in the simulation over the weekend The following link is to an additional article from McKinsey Quarterly which I think captures well the strategic and financial issues youll face in the Olympus simulation pdfwhispdftk you will need Adobe Acrobat to view this article I look forward to meeting you next week Francois Thrower Vice President Strategic Management Group Inc Kearny Street Suite San Francisco CA
